eteindre_appareil: Turn off the device when you've finished !
info_avion: The plane game is a game where you will have to make pushes spontaneously to get the most balloons as you can in less than XX minutes.
info_nageur:
In the swimmer game, you will have to make regular pushes to keep the swimmer closest to the center line. 
600m run = 5 minutes
info_temp: In this game, you will have to push during 6 seconds to be able to jump on the upper platform.
info_voiture: This game is a synthesis of the 3 others games: spontaneous pushes, regular pushes and maximal pushes.
app_non_trouve:
Device not found. Be sure it's plugged and reachable. 
If the problem sill here, unplug and plug again the gBs.
confirm_suppr: Are you sure delete your profile ?

enregistrer_avert: Do you want ot save your modifications ?
erreur_hauteur:
Please fill all blank.
 This must be more than 0
erreur_haut_max:
Maximum value must be greater
 than minimal value !
explications_hauteur: Please put the correct numbers you are seeing on the frame and save.
explications_mesure: You have to stay between 50.0 and 100.0 during 10 seconds. Click on Start recording when you're ready. The 10 seconds will start when you reach 50.0.
mode_familiale: The family mode aim to reach simple goals.
mode_sportif: The athletic mode aim to reach goals and beat them.

notif_2_jour: Remind me every 2 days to make exercices.
